name: CGT_Kit_Objc
summary: CGT_Kit_Objc provides all the basic set of libraries which are necessary for any project.
description:
A longer description of CGT_Kit_Objc in Markdown format.
* Setup all the basic libraries and boilerplate code which is required to build the iOS Objective project.
* CocoaPods will be using this to generate tags, and improve search results.
